Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Views

Class WorldBuilder

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Views.WorldBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdvancedBuilder, GeneralBuilder
public abstract class WorldBuilder extends Object
This class is the builder for the game setting.
It separates the scene building part from the original GameBoard class.
Version:
Version1.0
update: December 29th
Author:
Lin CHEN

    abstract void
    buildBackground(double height, double width)
    This function is used for building background image.

    This function is used for converting the palyer readable difficult level to int type.

  • Constructor Details

    • WorldBuilder

      WorldBuilder()

  • Method Details

    • buildSound

      public abstract void buildSound()
      This function is used for building background music.
      It needs to be implemented by its children, because different subclass has its own function of building the background music.

    • buildLevel

      public void buildLevel(String difficultLevel)
      This function is used for converting the palyer readable difficult level to int type.
      The converted level could be used for getting the specific level from the wall group in order to make the wall view.
      Parameters:
      difficultLevel - string stands for difficult level

    • buildWallGroups

      protected abstract void buildWallGroups(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rectangle, int options)
      This function is used for building wall.
      It needs to be implemented by its children, because different subclass has its own function of building the wall.
      Parameters:
      rectangle - expected wall drawing area
      options - player's choice for theme, not used in this builder type

    • buildBackground

      public abstract void buildBackground(double height, double width)
      This function is used for building background image.
      It needs to be implemented by its children, because different subclass has its own function of building the background image.
      Parameters:
      height - expected background height
      width - expected background width

    • buildWall

      public void buildWall(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rectangle, int options)
      This function is used for setting the wall according to the player chosen difficult level.
      Parameters:
      rectangle - the area used for showing bricks
      options - player's choice for theme, not used in this builder type

    • buildGroup

      public void buildGroup()
      This function sets the current wall group according to player chosen difficult level

    • getWorld

      public World getWorld()
      This function returns the built world
      Returns:
      world that have been built by the world builder

    • buildBall

      public abstract void buildBall(BallModel model, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      This function is used for building ball.
      It needs to be implemented by its children, because different subclass has its own function of building the ball.
      Parameters:
      model - expected ball model
      color - expected ball color

    • buildPaddle

      public abstract void buildPaddle(PaddleModel model, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, javafx.scene.image.Image image, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle drawArea)
      This function is used for building paddle.
      It needs to be implemented by its children, because different subclass has its own function of building the paddle.
      Parameters:
      model - expected paddle model
      color - expected paddle color
      drawArea - expected drawing area for the paddle
      image - expected image associated with the paddle

    • getType

      public abstract String getType()
      This function is getting the builder type.
      It needs to be implemented by its children, because different subclass stands for different world builder type.
      Returns:
      current world builder type
